introduction.content:
Web development engineer, I've been working for {AGE} years using Agile on front-end and back-end technologies. 
 I love Javascript, React and Java.

build.title: Build / Tactical
build.practice:
Design / Modeling, 
 System engineering, 
 Application / Software Architecture

agile.title: Agile
agile.notions:
Maximization of the value produced (MVP, Spike), 
 Product backlog management (creation, maintenance, prioritization, optimization), 
 SCRUM Reporting (KPIS, visual management)
agile.practice:
Support for teams (self-organization, decision-making, etc.), 
 Assurance of compliance with the Scrum framework
agile.mastery:
Animation of Scrum rituals (daily, sprint planning, demo, retrospective), 
 Agile methodological watch

quality.title: Software Quality
quality.practice: Improvement of the recipe book, Recipe management (QA Back-up)

tools.title: Tools
tools.practice:
AWS S3, 
 Rancher, Docker, 
 Springboot, Maven 
 Webpack, Node, 
 Next.js, Phrase

development.title: Development
development.mastery:
Typescript, Javascript, React, 
 Angular JS, Angular, 
 HTML5, SASS, LESS
